import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ContainerCard, WrapperCards, CardSkill, CardsTitle, CardsPropContainer, CardSkillItems, CardTag, CardImg, StyledLink, } from "./StylesCard"; import { Container, Item } from "../pagination/StylesPagination"; import { usePoke } from "../../../components/context/Provider"; import { MdSystemUpdateAlt } from "react-icons/md"; import ModelEdit from "../../modelEdit/ModelEdit"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { IoCloseSharp, IoCreateOutline } from "react-icons/io5"; import EditPokemon from "../../editPokemon/EditPokemon"; export default function Cards({ nextPagePokemon, previousPagePokemon, actualPage, }) { const { pokemonData, active } = usePoke(); return ( <> {pokemonData.map((pokemon) => ( {pokemon.name} {pokemon.attack} {pokemon.defense} Ataque Defesa {pokemon.type} <> {modal && (
setName(e.target.value)} />
setSprite(e.target.value)} />
setAttack(e.target.value)} />
setDefense(e.target.value)} />
)} ))} {actualPage - 1 === 0 ? ( "" ) : ( {actualPage - 1} )} {actualPage} {actualPage + 1} ); }
